short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GYSA displays adorable animated GIFs that instantly make you feel better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GYSA is a simple extension that displays adorable GIFs with every click. Whether reading a boring article, attending a lecture series, or binge-watching horror shows, GYSA is just a click away!
